code: import{useContext}from"react";import{Button,notification}from"antd";import{StoreContext}from"../store";import{CART_ADD_ITEM}from"../utils/constants";import{CartIcon}from"./Icons";import{ShoppingCartOutlined}from'@ant-design/icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AddToCart(_ref){var product=_ref.product,qty=_ref.qty;var _useContext=useContext(StoreContext),dispatch=_useContext.dispatch;var openNotification=function openNotification(){notification.open({message:'Shopping Notification',description:"".concat(qty," ").concat(qty>1?"pieces":"piece"," of ").concat(product.name," ").concat(qty>1?"have":"has"," been added to your cart."),icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCartOutlined,{style:{color:'#108ee9'}}),onClick:function onClick(){console.log('Notification Clicked!');},placement:'bottomRight'});};var addToCart=function addToCart(){openNotification();dispatch({type:CART_ADD_ITEM,payload:{id:product.id,name:product.name,image:product.image,price:product.price,countInStock:product.countInStock,qty:qty}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{type:"primary",className:"btn-tocar",onClick:addToCart,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartIcon,{size:20}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{marginLeft:12},children:"Add To Shopping Bag"})]});}
